titles.title: For the relief of Julian Mart, Paul Mart, Vernoica Mart, and Adelina Mart.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 7/13/2000--Introduced. Declares Julian Mart, Paul Mart, Veronica Mart, and Adelina Mart to each be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
